title: WEDNESDAY -  Steelers looking to silence critics
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY -  Steelers looking to silence critics
description:
The Steelers have lost two straight (0:07), but can still clinch the division with a win over the Bengals. Head coach Mike Tomlin says (0:41) he's blocking out all the outside noise. Could it be a Super Bowl preview (1:02) when the Chiefs and Saints face off this week? Saints head coach Sean Payton joined the Huddle and Flow podcast and talked (1:36) about their loss to the Eagles. We have the latest on a potential Postseason bubble (2:58) and Dez Bryant ready to throw up the "X" again for the Ravens (3:22) while The Raiders (3:54) will be shorthanded for their Thursday night matchup with the Chargers

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
